about_the_game:
SRX is an arcade racing game in which the player pilots all types of flying vehicles.

Explore, master more than 15 tracks split in episodes and beat everyone to reach the top of the world rankings.
(WARNING: In this demo, the most difficult tracks are locked)
Each episode is linked to a scenario where the world is frozen in time.
An active tutorial is available, explaining the different moves of the vehicles.
The player is able to choose between 4 vehicle profiles.
Of course more episodes, tracks and vehicles are coming soon!
